entry.title: Second Post: Finally Got This Thing Running
entry.content:
Alrighty that took most of the night but I finally got this thing up and running. It had pretty good instructions for me not knowing git, github, ruby, rake, and all of the other things... however after about 2 nights I have the default up and running and I am pleased. If I can get this post to appear I might well slap myself. Anyways, its fun to learn new things and I'm going to hopefully learn git and improve my css as I design this blog to be more of what I want it to be.

Stay tuned :D

  • Dave

entry.title: First_post
entry.content: This is the greates post I have evar seen!
